<table><thead><tr><th>

</th><th>

Modifiers


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

[tokens()](./css-parser-algorithms.whitespacenode.tokens.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

Retrieve the tokens for the current whitespace. This is the inverse of parsing from a list of tokens.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[toString()](./css-parser-algorithms.whitespacenode.tostring.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

Convert the current whitespace to a string. This is not a true serialization. It is purely a concatenation of the string representation of the tokens.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
